info.title: Real Estate Contract Type
info.description: The Service allows users to read the Real Estate Contract Type separately. Create, Update and Delete operations are not supported for this service. It focuses solely on additional read functionalities.

x-sap-shortText: Read Real Estate Contract Types using this inbound service

values.text: SAP Real Estate Contract API Integration(SAP_COM_0393)
